MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReader GetMetadataReader (this System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.PEReader peReader);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReader GetMetadataReader(class System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.PEReader peReader) cil managed

static member GetMetadataReader : System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.PEReader -> System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReader

remarks.format:
## Remarks
调用方必须在 <xref:System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.PEReader> 元数据读取器的整个生存期内保持活动和未释放。

Docs.exception: 从基础流中读取时出现 IO 错误。
